name: minitroid (tducasse, Mauricet)
description:
⚠ I strongly recommend downloading the Windows version, the web port has a few issues, screen tears, sound glitches, etc. Sorry about that! -----

A small 64x64 game inspired by Metroid - made for LOWREZJAM 2021. Made with Love2d, ported to web with love.js.

----- Controls

- A/D or LEFT/RIGHT to move
- SPACE or Z to jump
- J or X to shoot
- W/S or UP/DOWN to use the morph ball (once you have it)

Items Morph ball: press S or DOWN to morph in, and W or UP to morph out. Useful to reach narrow places.Missile: once you have this, your gun shoots missiles instead of the standard bullets. Try it against Metroids! ----- Art@mauricetMusicMyself with Bosca CeoilSound EffectsMyself, with BFXR
